last_episode_to_air.name: Episode Eight
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Frederick grieves the loss of Clara, Enright receives a letter that pushes Frederick to confront his past. Clara and Davison adapt to life in the North, as Clara grapples with happy memories of home.

name: Belgravia: The Next Chapter
overview: Belgravia, 1871. When Lord Frederick Trenchard meets Clara Dunn, their courtship is full of passion. But after they marry, the scandalous world of high society and a long-buried family secret threaten to unravel their happiness.

episodes.name: Episode One
episodes.overview: After a passionate courtship, Lord Frederick Trenchard marries the young, striking Clara Dunn, but Belgravia’s scandals and the secrets from Frederick’s past threaten the couple’s newfound happiness.

episodes.name: Episode Two
episodes.overview: After an argument, Frederick tries to renew the relationship by taking Clara to Glanville, their country estate, and reveals some of the trials of his childhood. The Dunns take in the mysterious Nell as their new maid.

episodes.name: Episode Three
episodes.overview: The Trenchards travel to Maywood for the Duke’s birthday. Behind the scenes, business deals are struck, but the Rochesters have private reasons for the trip. Meanwhile, Clara conspires to repair Frederick and James’ relationship.

episodes.name: Episode Four
episodes.overview: Reeling from James’ visit, Frederick pushes forward in his work at the foundry, while Clara finds comfort in a new group of friends made through Dr. Ellerby. A lonely James seeks solace elsewhere.

episodes.name: Episode Five
episodes.overview: As Clara’s fascination with Stephen’s world develops, she makes a bold decision that alarms Davison. Meanwhile, James’ private life finds him under threat, and Frederick grows determined to become part of the Marquise’s new venture.

episodes.name: Episode Six
episodes.overview: Emily confronts Clara about the painting, worried about the potential scandal for their family. Frederick moves forward with his investment in the silver mine, but Ross begins to grow suspicious of the Marquise.

episodes.name: Episode Seven
episodes.overview: Rumors about Clara and Stephen swirl around Belgravia and it feels like only a matter of time until they reach Frederick. Ross learns some information about the Marquise and sees an opportunity.

episodes.name: Episode Eight
episodes.overview: As Frederick grieves the loss of Clara, Enright receives a letter that pushes Frederick to confront his past. Clara and Davison adapt to life in the North, as Clara grapples with happy memories of home.
